website_summaries.verdict: A budget reading light that comes with a battery, so you can use it right away.
pros: Has a strong clip that's small enough to be used on a thin paperback or Kindle
Battery life is good and battery itself is easily replaceable
but will survive travel use with no problem
cons: Some users complain that the light was too bright for nighttime use

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHTNESS OF THE SUN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for replacing the SUN if it were to ever burn out. Purchased for my husband and myself to go on our new kindles. We laughed for about 5 minutes about how comically bright it was. My husband went to read while I was planning to sleep, and when he turned on his new light, it lit up the entire room. Bright enough that it was hard for him to read because it was hurting his eyes. Unnecessarily bright.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Dias

customer_reviews.title: Handy Travel Light
customer_reviews.text: Such a convenient light to have on hand while traveling or in a room without a lamp. I love that it is sturdy, but lightweight so that I can use it on paperback books... It stays attached, flexes and brightens the pages well and doesn’t leave any marks on the covers or pages where it is “pinched” closed.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend uses this light for a car seat light. Works good. Not too bright / not too dim. Flexible. And super light weight. our son doesn’t mind the light at all. She turns it on when we are driving at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs18

customer_reviews.title: Changing the battery on this product is non intuitive. ...
customer_reviews.text: Changing the battery on this product is non intuitive. I contacted Energizer and they were unable to help me. How can you sell a product with no instructions on how to replace the battery? This was probably meant to be a throw away item. Avoid this book light!
customer_reviews.author: DigitalMah

customer_reviews.title: No longer in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It came with a battery already in place. The light just has one setting but it is plenty bright enough to read in the dark but without disturbing someone sleeping next to you. I'm very satisfied with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great little light! Perfect for coloring in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Great little light! Not too bright, not too dim. I like to color in bed before going to sleep it's soothing. This light helps to see even the tiniest lines to color without keeping my husband awake. Just make sure u have some extra batteries laying around. The battery life last days if u use a good brand of battery. I would definitely recommend this light to my friends and family! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Brianna McNair

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find, but worth the effort!
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to source, but it saved the day....or night! Got into reading at night before going to sleep. But using real books presented a lighting problem...as my wife complained about the spotlight being on! Got to looking for a "book light" and found them hard to find as most people are using tablets or readers. Thanks to Amazon, I found this light and it made both me and the wife happy! The clip can only grab a few pages...guess its made for hardback books but I am in the middle of a couple of soft cover books. Plenty of light to read by!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie in BC

customer_reviews.title: Use to bust drug smugglers, not read.
customer_reviews.text: There are the lumens necessary to read a book in a dark room, and then there are the lumens necessary to spot drug runners across four nautical miles of pitch black ocean waters, blind the captain and seize their stash in a bloodless show of high seas justice. This light has the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Damien S

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: Wish the light was a little softer. Wanted to use as a reading light in bed when either me or my girlfriend were sleeping, but its a bit much. Works great in a room that isnt completely dark.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth buying because of the difficulty and inconvenience of changing the batteries very frequently.
customer_reviews.text: It’s convenient to attach to a book. The problem is that the batteries have a very short life so if you are using this nightly, you will have to replace the batteries very often. I was not even able to remove one of the screws in the battery compartment. Most other devices you can slide the battery compartment open and replace the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lori West

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this brand of book light for awhile now. I use it to light up the dashboard for my car because the lights are out. It is pretty bright when it is brand new, but the better life on this light is very short. And to make it worse, you cannot replace the battery yourself. If you do not plan on using the light much, it will do pretty well, but if you plan on leaving it on for long periods of time, I suggest you find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Reading Light! Nice Warm LED Illumination.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight book light. I love the warmth of the light from the LED, and how easy it is to turn on/off. The rubberized clamp on the attaching end is nice for a tablet, book, or other device without fear of it being scratched by hard plastic (like other alternatives on the market). The lightweight design also makes its use less cumbersome than other lighting solutions, since this doesn't hinder reading at all. I bought two, one for me and the other for my family, we love them. Battery replacement is easy as well, with the cover being held in place by two small Phillips screws, and the it containing a CR-2302 flat battery. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Dale R.Top Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Great despite some reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I bought this booklight mainly because of some of the funny reviews that said how bright it is and it was so inexpensive. I'm glad I gave it a shot because I'm thinking maybe some of those folks were reading by candlelight before! Hah! I didn't find it to be overly bright. I like how small it is; it's good for paperbacks and smaller books that can't handle the mighty bright versions that are too heavy. I didn't give it five because I haven't had it long, don't know how long batteries will last, or whether it will be difficult to change them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasta in VA

customer_reviews.title: Choose another option. Too bright!!!!! And not adjustable 2 states because it IS a book light and it does turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's a book light. But it's way too bright. And there's no means of adjustment. The first night I used it, it woke my wife. Which is what it was bought to prevent. Further, my eyes a sensitive to bright light so I can't use it either. Into the junk drawer it goes! I'd choose another option. White light of this intensity, this close to bed WILL mess up your sleep cycle! Perhaps some blue or white translucent plastic over the lens??? Caviet Emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Polymath-1776

customer_reviews.title: Works great and well-made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book light - I’ve tried others and this one really stands out it being solidly made and high-quality - you don’t have to worry about it breaking if you drop it once. It’s got good materials good fit and finish and the light is both bright and a nice warm temperature. This is also a lot better than trying to use some multipurpose light or flashlight because it clips onto most bucks easily and has just the right amount of link then flexibility to work well to illuminate most sizes of book. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Nat

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly bright light from SUCH a tiny gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! You won't believe it when you see it. There were no instructions with it, so I am going to rely on one of the battery technicians at my local ACE Hardware store when needed. I love this tiny little thing. It has proved to be a previously unsuspected help in things other than reading. When searching boxes that are packed away and cannot be looked into conveniently, this little light was a godsend! I would buy it again and again for gifts. Thank you for selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J. C. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: could be better could be worse
customer_reviews.text: not sure if it's the product but I'm not so impressed the brightness is pretty good when the battery is fresh and i do go thru batteries pretty quick although they are super cheap got them off amazon less than $5 for 4 batteries and it only takes 2 at a time i would say I'm not a heavy reader but i do use it about 3 to 4 times a week using it 2 hours a pop and replace batteries every couple weeks also the neck where you adjust it does not bend enough to brighten bottom of page unless its a smaller book
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ghiotto

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how thin and lightweight this is. I wish it had multiple brightness settings but it works great for my needs. I don't like to read in a bright room at night but want sufficient light on my book nonetheless. The arm could be a little more flexible but I understand it's not for folding purposes, which I really love the folding feature by the way! I didn't like the battery type it uses but I will deal with it since it brings me more convenience than other lights. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This Little Light Of Mine
customer_reviews.text: After an electric outage, I decided to purchase one of these lights. Of course since that time we have not had an outage. However, this little light of mine, is wonderful. My living room light is dim, and I used this light to assist while reading. Although it is bright, it is not too bright. I can deal with it. This is a compact portable book light that runs with 2 Energizer CR2032 Batteries, which are included.. I can take this compact book light anywhere, and as I mentioned it is handy to have in power outages!l Recommended. prisrob 05-12-2020
customer_reviews.author: prisrob

customer_reviews.title: Just do it and enjoy reading in low light
customer_reviews.text: Bough this for my wife and her late night reading. She has been wanting a bed mounted light but with our custom reclaimed wood bed the headboard is over 10 thick and wouldn't fit any commercially built bed light. Once we got this in she immediately wanted to sit down have a cup of coffee and turn some pages, and she enjoyed every minute of it. The light outs out a soft white color light easy on the eyes but bright enough to light up both pages of the book with ease. Went ahead and bought a 25 pack of CR2032 batteries off Amazon aswell to make sure she's stocked up. Thanks Energizer for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marin II

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Compact
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the light and the clip fold together, but it has a weird battery, isn't rechargeable, and is seriously bright! I had purchased it because I wanted to read at night while my baby slept in the bassinet next to me, but it was so bright it would wake her up. I have it clipped onto my desktop now, to use on my desk, if I need to grab something from it without turning on the room's lights, but I won't be using it in bed any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, CLEAR TAPE over light fixed it.
customer_reviews.text: Light bright!!! BUT... Using this to read bible while my baby asleep. I don’t like holding tablets and phones which give off radiation while reading for long period. This light allows me to read. I used clear tape over the light to really tone it down. It works great and is not super bright. The light before the clear tape would go beyond the book and show on the wall and really make the room brighter. The tape works if you feel it too bright. Also the settings don’t really appear to make it lighter or dimmer unless mine is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Saves

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Update June 2018 Serves its purpose! A) Still definitely too heavy and wobbly, B) Far too bright I had to scribble over the light with marker to tone it down! C) Not gentle on books. Clamp works too well, and has just ruffled up my book a bit. Bottom line: it's worth under 7 and not more than 7 based on reasons above. It's a good night and serves its purpose but I miss my old light that folded over pages like a clam shell. I must look to replace that one! So far it's good, just a little bulkier than I imagined. Will update with photos!
customer_reviews.author: Lilac Roe Pin

customer_reviews.title: Great for lighting up entire rooms
customer_reviews.text: So while this thing does a great job... it basically lights up an entire room and also blinds you or anyone nearby if you accidentally point it their direction. I’m considering putting it in my purse for emergencies. The clip weighs down paperback book pages significantly as well making it hard to actually use as a book light. I have been just setting it on my chest while laying down to read. (Side nite it makes a great deterrent to get my husband to do what I want at night by disturbing his darkness with a bright light to the eyes). I’m still not sure if I’ll be keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY bright.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a book reading light it’s more like an actual night stand light it’s so bright.... might as well bought an actual lamp. I bought this to read while my husband sleeps and definitely can’t use it. It lights up the ceiling from the reflection of the book that’s how bright it is not to mention you can’t even turn down the brightness because it’s just one on/off switch... not useful for what I needed. Didn’t think I could go wrong with a reading light and threw the package away...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because I thought it would be lightweight - it is SO BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for reading at night, but he tried to use it the other night and it is SO BRIGHT! It also really doesn't bend very well. However, it does it's job - how can you complain about a light being too bright... but just be aware. We have our 4 week old son in our room in a bassinet still which is why my husband wanted this light, but it is almost too bright to have with him in there. It was worth the price and I like the light batteries and light clip.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: If you love reading then you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this sooner? I love love love this reading light, it clips on and is adjustable which makes it so much easier to use. No more keeping the night light on or sitting at the dinner table with the lights on.. I can just read in bed while my partner sleep peacefully undisturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Panter

customer_reviews.title: Batteries & where to clip light
customer_reviews.text: Really great and bright light for reading. Just have to clip it to the back of a book with some extra pages if reading at the beginning and vice verse if getting towards the end of the book, otherwise it just falls forward. First world problems, but it doesn’t take AAA batteries. Takes the small circle “button cell/ coin batteries”.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rind

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and okay bright.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn’t even realize it was an Energizer brand until I opened my delivery box. But it seems like an okay brightness. The light color is warm, not real or true white. If you need something that shows true white, don’t get this. I’m using it for my portable sketch tablet so I can sketch in bed with the night stand lights off. It does the trick okay but is not too flexible. Seems to either curl or straight and that’s it. Can make it Leann further for larger surfaces (but honestly it’s meant for book reading and for that it’s probably perfect. Since I just got it I don’t know about battery life.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Like a laser beam in the eyes. Wayyyyy too bright. Can not adjust light. You have to unscrew little tiny screws in back once the batteries run out of juice. Which means you need to buy a little tiny screwdriver and more batteries after 25 hours reading time. This product IS NOT RECHARGABLE. Can only return to Kohl’s for free returns. Special return because of the lithium batteries. Buy a amber rechargeable book light instead. Your eyes will thank you and it will save you a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: angel1212

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect the first three times I used it. Then, it wouldn’t even turn on when I needed it desperately in the back of a dark classroom! If a battery company is selling something, you would think they would at least put a new battery in their product. Sincerely disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Liked this until time to change the batteries. Tiny screws, hard to do... but if the batteries last long not that big of deal right? Well like other reviewers mine does not work once batteries are replaced. I took great care in noting proper placement, etc and no light emitting at all. Now I have a dead piece of plastic and a bunch of batteries that I am not sure I have another use for. Consider this disposable. Will be shopping for a rechargeable one now.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G

customer_reviews.title: TOO BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can read at night while my husband and babies could sleep undisturbed, but man this thing lit up our room like a mini lamp. I've barely used it because of the excessive brightness. Two stars because it's flexible and feels sturdy. Other than that, unusable for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO BRIGHT. I don't know how anyone can use this for reading. It's got to be better suited to surgery or nighttime car repairs. I hated it immediately but took it on an evening flight with me anyway. When the flight attendants turned off the lights I turned it on... and it illuminated the entire row of seats... on both sides of the aisle. It was comical that my book light was brighter than the annoying overhead lights already installed in the plane. When I turned it on in my bedroom at night, it illuminated the entire room. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Way too bright
customer_reviews.text: The light on this thing is way too bright!! A little bit of false advertising stating that the light is just for you and won’t disturb anyone. I’m laying in bed and go to turn this thing on and it literally lights up the whole room! Way too bright, do not recommend if you are NOT trying to wake or keep your significant other awake, going to look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: ST2008

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: As many others have stated this is very bright. Not sure how hubby can sleep while im reading at night. I wish this was a red or blue light instead of white. Maybe it wouldn't be as bright. This being said you can see both sides of the pages without issues. The light bends in such a way that you can adjust it to fit your needs. It does seem to bend on its own slightly over the course of my reading so I have to push it up. However it hasn't become annoying yet.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia L.

customer_reviews.title: Great light until replacing the batteries-- total frustration and fail.
customer_reviews.text: I loved my book light. It was nice and bright. It had a sturdy clip. I even used it as an accessory to clip on my laptop to see my keyboard at night or as a quick night light. Changing the batteries was total frustration and fail. I could not get them to stay in place or synch with the switch. I would have bought another one of these, but after trying over and over again to get these freekin batteries in, forget about it. I am going to look for another product. Lots of luck if you buy this and need to replace the batteries. Sucks, because I did like the light. It appears I'm not the only one.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my kids so they could read their books in bed. I thought that by buying a name brand, the quality would be better than a cheap knock off. It’s not. After two weeks of reading a little bit at night time, the batteries died. New batteries for this light are not cheap and it is getting too expensive to keep replacing them. Also, the clip to hold it on the the book already broke. Such a cheap item. Much better off with a different light.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Way too bright and not at all “warm”
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously too bright if you’re not trying to disturb someone in the room, which I feel like is the main reason to get this. It is also way too “cool” on the led spectrum, not at all “warm”. It needs a dimmer and different leds. I get that it’s a cheap little light but it also has really one function. If I wanted half the room visible I’d just turn on a lamp
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Helps me to drive without any distractions when my kid is reading at the back seat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is very fond of reading, most of the time during night journeys she sometimes switch the rear seat light which distracts me during driving so I was looking for some small lights which she can use for her reading without switching on the rear seat light. This perfectly solves my purpose especially because this is bright enough that she don't have to put lots of stress on her eyes and focused enough that this does not distract me anymore. 2 reason I have given a star less is because I cannot change the batteries without using any tools like screw drivers, and second reason is the build quality looks little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Dayal

customer_reviews.title: Great booklight for $8-$10
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I have definitely gone past 25 hours on the battery, and although it has gotten noticeably dimmer, it has surpassed the amount of time promised. I'll probably replace the battery soon, because it's a great light. The clip stays in place pretty well and the neck is flexible so I can adjust the direction when reading in different positions and keep the light from shining towards my husband's side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: SFarrel

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: As we age, our night vision suffers. I think I was putting off reading because it wasn't as easy as it used to be. Good glasses and one of these lights makes all the difference. Turn the screens off at a set time and read. You know you miss it. These will help.
customer_reviews.author: Madge C

customer_reviews.title: Great... as a flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what you would expect, except this thing is bright!i was lokking for a dimmer reading light for my books in bed, but this is quite bright. I have to put this behing my head with a sheet over it to make it dimmer. Its great as an almost flashlight than a reading light. I will have to look for somethimg not quite as bright. Itd be much better with a dimmer or different levels of brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vandegrift

customer_reviews.title: You will wish you had spent just a few more dollars on something better.
customer_reviews.text: The breadth of the light is not actually that wide, so while it is say, clipped to the back cover of a book it really only illuminates the page on the right and not so much on the left. My other problem is that it is not really stable or well balanced. Use on any kind of paper back leads to flopping and swaying and generally a somewhat frustrating reading experience. If you need a clip light, sure this one is fairly cheap and generally effective. For reading specifically I would say this light definitely falls short. You will wish you had spent just a few more dollars on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Marq Kensworth

customer_reviews.title: Top-heavy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I expected for the price, but unfortunately, this book light was top-heavy so it did not stay up on its' own well. The neck was also not as flexible or mobile as described. I returned this product immediately and kept LuminoLite that I purchased at the same time, that has a neck with more movement, and it is rechargeable!! $8ish dollars more, but I shouldn't have been so frugal, especially, when the battery use on this product would add up eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesy Brooke-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: An excellent light. Some reviews says it too bright, but I also bought the mighty bright and French bull at the same time. This is a warmer light than the French bull so even though the spread of the light is a bit more it is less instrusive. From the three this is my favourite. The mighty bright was bad built quality, didn’t work and now binned, the French bull is a white light and I’ve keep as dinky and a handy back up. The engergizer is a robust built unit, a tad large for smaller books, but very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighthouses aren’t as bright
customer_reviews.text: Wish I’d read the reviews about the brightness. I could use this sucker to land planes or ward ships off the coast. Wow. If you’re not concerned about keeping someone else up, it’s a fabulous light. But I, like most, wanted this so I could read when my partner was sleeping. Not the right product for that goal.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marie Fekete

customer_reviews.title: Great light, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: At the time I purchased this, it was just under eight bucks. Reading the older reviews almost scared me off, but I figured for the money it was worth a try. I’m glad I did. They must’ve refined the design over the years. I don’t think that the light is too bright, the neck is very flexible, and I love how it folds up and has the little cock to hold the clip so it stays folded up. Time will tell on the battery life, but for now I love this little light. I might order another one.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBellBlue

customer_reviews.title: Worse than having my bedside light on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light so that I could read in bed while my husband sleeps. The thing lights the whole room up. It's just way too much. It would be great if it had a 1/2 power setting, but it doesn't. It is light weight and bends easily, but the power of the light just ruins it. I occasionally wake in the middle of the night and will read to help myself fall back to sleep, but that light wakes me right the hell up.
customer_reviews.author: dnd517

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a used book light, but it still works
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was quick, but the packaging for the light was already opened. So, I was sent a used product, and that’s why I rated this lower. Honestly, it’s not worth my time and effort to return this small purchase, so I’ll likely hold onto the used light and hope it lasts. It turns on and the light is bright. It would be nice if there were brightness levels and color temperature adjustments, but it’s a cheap light so I wasn’t expecting those features at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: JBtrees

customer_reviews.title: Broke shortly after receiving
customer_reviews.text: Convenient reading lamp, but it broke on me after less than 10 hours use. The switch for on\off malfunctioned, rendering this useless. Tried fresh batteries, hoping that was all, but it was no use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Book Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I am in agreement with the others, this book light is super bright. I would consider it more of a flashlight and less of a book light. It has a single on-and-off switch, so you get one brightness level. They could cut the brightness by a good 50% easily and it would be more suitable for nighttime reading. I would like to see a newer version with a slider that adjusts the power.
customer_reviews.author: Team Brule

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe this was only $6!!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost went with other, more expensive options but really happy that I tried this one out first. It’s exactly what I was looking for. I had forgotten how much I love reading in bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be better
customer_reviews.text: Not to Happy with the light. The arm isn’t as flexible as I would have liked. It basically is bent to a predetermined spot and doesn’t want to give/bend more. The light flickers or dims on its own. Doesn’t cover the whole page on a book I have to move the light constantly. Over all thought it would be better being that it was an energizer product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina E. Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful light! I only gave it 4 stars on the brightness because I wish I was able to dim it as it is a bit bright. I was laying next to my husband in bed reading the other night and it totally lit his side of the bed up as well. But other than that, it’s lightweight, provides more than enough light. Is flexible, and easy to use. Very happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were brighter
customer_reviews.text: It helps in dim light settings, the light is bright enough to see when the surroundings are very dark, but when surroundings still have some light, this little lamp can't do much. Battery is awesome though, 6 months and it still going!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while reading during the night and it is perfect. It is just bright enough that you can see but not too bright that its blinding. The clip opens wide to be able to grasp multiple pages and the flexibility of the light is great. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kreitzman

customer_reviews.title: Okay, boomer.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews here complaining about the brightness of this light. There’s only one generation of people bold enough to complain that a device designed to bring light into dark areas is too bright, and those people are baby boomers. So, if you’re a normal person and not an entitled, planet killing, racist, this is the book light for you. If you’re concerned about this tiny little light being too bright, I can only say one thing; okay, boomer.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to use in choir because we are situated in a dark area in the back of the church. It provided just the right amount of light for me to see my music. I highly recommend it For reading in any place where the light is just not enough to see clearly. I cannot yet comment on battery life because I’ve only had it about three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Slim2u

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is BRIGHT. You really have to make sure you're aiming it where you want to, but it does a pretty good job on lighting up just the area you want it to, and not disturbing the rest of the room. I use it to read in bed and even with how bright it is, it doesn't seem to bother anyone else as long as I keep it aimed just at my book.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car reading light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for car reading, only used for a month so not sure about longevity. Very easy to use even for my 7 year old. just clip on a book and start reading. He never forgets to turn off the light afterwards. With car lights, he always left on after he gets off and we ended up with low battery next morning before getting ready to work.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Both have already quit working. It's not the batteries, they flicker on and off. They didn't hold position when they were working, lights were very dim. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Light Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book light so I could read into the night while my partner snoozed away. Which I use frequently now, and certainly has increased the amount I am reading. But the clip itself is so sturdy that I have used the light as a mini flashlight several times now. The light even works will on paper back books too! Definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: D Thom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I just wish it had a low and high setting
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a low and high setting because this light is bright!!!! Your partner won't be able to sleep because it's bright but it's durable, and the price was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Essence W.

customer_reviews.title: great product... I think
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for reading as my eyes start to fail. i was disappointed that the batteries were already dying when the package arrived and that I have to buy new batteries (2 of the flat kind C2032) already. potentially a great product but add that plastic strip that keeps the batteries unused until the first time I turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Heath M.

customer_reviews.title: Great night light
customer_reviews.text: This little light is powerful! Used for night time word search and my boyfriend is never bothered by it, truly only shines where it is pointing. I like the flexible head so you can point in any direction. Only had this for a short period of time so I’m not sure the battery life is but if you turn it off I’m sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: Bright but eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: I guess it depends on how long you want to read, right? I haven’t actually timed it, but I only use the light occasionally for an hour or so at a time but have had to replace the batteries several times. Three tiny little Phillips screws (don’t drop em!) and a couple more CR2032 batteries and we’re good to go again. Wish this was rechargeable...
customer_reviews.author: capo

customer_reviews.title: Too bright to use
customer_reviews.text: This light is so bright you can see it from space. My boyfriend & I cried laughing about how bright it is. There’s no way you can use this next to a sleeping partner. I would only buy this again if all of a sudden all my lamps broke. It could easily replace an overhead light in any room. Honestly, I’m very sad that it isn’t going to work and I wasted my money. I now have to buy another one from another brand because there’s no way I can use this unless I read under the covers & I won’t do that bc I’m no longer 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice. I was thrilled to finally have an item like this and I had bought my friend one as well. When I went to clamp it on for the third use, the back part of the clamp was snapped in half and wouldn't stay upright. It was kept in a drawer at my bedside where it could not have gotten damaged. Just cheap craftsmanship. Very disappointed in Energizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amelynn Bright

customer_reviews.title: Good for bedtime stories
customer_reviews.text: I use this to read to my pre schoolers before bed time because I'm too lazy to get back up and turn off the light. I normally fall asleep just after reading to them, so I don't bother getting back out of bed. It works great with hardcover books, but it's a little tricky with those soft cover books since they're so flimsy. Also, my kids love to play with it so it's constantly on and I'm still on the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dara P

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and gives just the right amount of light and brightness. The light bends so you can position it in an angle that works, this feature isn't great as it doesn't bend fully and sometimes doesn't stay where you want it, but for the price this light is definitely worth it. Battery life is very good, I have it for several months and just ordered another light for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright. I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. The packaged seems alittle open on the dotted lines on the back but that's okay. The light is very bright which I like. I read my manga when I walk the dogs so it's very nice to be able to see it. The clip doesn't open very much so I just put it on a good handle fun or pages to hold it up. Seems a little heavier than my last booklight but I'm seeing how this does. Good price for it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn cleary

customer_reviews.title: Book Light
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightweight property of this light. However, I think the neck is too short - does not shine enough light further down the page of the normal sized book. As far as the battery life, I have not had to change the batteries yet, but have not tracked the hours it has lasted. All said, I rate this as fair.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this light!
customer_reviews.text: I have stayed away from these type of lights forever because I just didn’t think they would be affective. Now with a toddler in the house I need to control my light output more than ever so I have it a shot. It works great, it’s like having a light on but your also in the dark so it’s kind of fun. Anyways, I think it works great and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul MItchell the School Colorado Spring

customer_reviews.title: Don’t care for this one
customer_reviews.text: Not bright enough and the area it lights up is too small. I don’t like having it attached to the book either. I bought a different one after this one that is rechargeable, has two adjustable lights and rest around my neck and not on the book. I like it better. It has 3 brightness levels. This one only has one and it is too dim.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hazen

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd like this light, but I was so very wrong! The light started flickering immediately upon use. The switch slides down and loses connection while reading so your light will shut off mid-sentence...the battery lasted all of two weeks. This light was an absolute waste of money from brand I thought I could trust
customer_reviews.author: Wow2MuchBS

customer_reviews.title: too much light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could read at night without disturbing my spouse, however the span of the light, lights up the entire area around me as well as the book. I tried maneuvering the light so it only shone right on the page i was on, but then I have to reposition it to try to turn the page. So while it lights up the book for sure, it was not any better than having a lap on, unless you don't have a lamp nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is pretty terrible!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these for our kids to read with once they were tucked into bed. The batteries died on one of them after three weeks. They are changeable, but not an easy to find battery and the compartment is screwed shut with a jewelry sized screw. I replaced hers with a USB rechargeable one. The others are still working but get very light use.
customer_reviews.author: happymama

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the light would be too bright for my light sensitive eyes. It is not. The yellow light is just bright enough and sturdy enough to hold itself up once clipped to book. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CZM

customer_reviews.title: Okay. With caveats.
customer_reviews.text: So I like the light weight. Though I wish the product had a brightness setting. Because frankly when it’s on sometimes it’s too bright. But that might be OK for some people. The gooseneck works although I wish it was just a little bit longer to give it a little more bend. Value for money is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Troy In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good Reading Light
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would be too bright after reading other reviews, but it’s just right. I can read with it without disturbing my grandson who is sometimes next to me. I’m not sure about the battery life as it’s too new, so I might have to change the rating stars later. It’s light enough and stays in place on my book. I’m finding it to be very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Reader

customer_reviews.title: Way too bright
customer_reviews.text: It's trash. Its insanely bright it might as well be a lamp. Completely defeats the purpose of having a private booklight. Do not recommend unless you are in need of a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love hate
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate with this thing... it takes 2 lithium batteries, and it does fast, I read for 2 hours or so a night and so far its lasted maybe 2 weeks before dying... and when I say 2 weeks I mean its strength steadily declines... problem is I love it because it sits great in the book and is easily moveable so I can keep the shine out of the hubby's eyes
customer_reviews.author: Mariy31

customer_reviews.title: I can read while my husband sleeps!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a few weeks now and it has definitely made reading easier for me to do while my husband sleeping in the bed next to me. It is very light weight and bright enough for you to see all the words on your page and the page next to it the only complaint I have is that I wish the clip was big enough to hold as a page holder or book mark, which is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars, otherwise this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Almost too bright
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but maybe a little too great. I bought this so I could read in bed without disturbing my spouse, but it's very bright. It's better than leaving the room light on so I can read, but still brighter than I'd like so as not to disturb anyone else in the room. For the price, I'm not mad.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The perfect book light! It’s not too bright but not too dim either. AND it does not pin point the light to a single spot in the page and then all the surrounding area is significantly dimmer. No! The light casts itself equally over the page, making the reading experience wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light. It casts a perfect circle that doesn't disturb my husband when I'm reading in bed. The battery life is OK at @25 hours for 2 CR2032. I just am keeping the batteries on hand. Was using a wired light previously and this is a much better option. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jainagirl

customer_reviews.title: Blinding!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my girlfriend wouldn’t be interrupted by my night stand light. It was brighter than the sun. No dimmer settings...even though it would have had to be .05% of the current light intensity of it had a dimmer. Imagine someone driving toward you at night with their brights on.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Steven Michaels

customer_reviews.title: batteries run out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works well- except when it doesn’t! Batteries (Lithium) ran out in less than a month of only about 1 hour of use per day. I’ve already had to replace the batteries (which is difficult to do- have to remove 3 TINY screws) with new, pretty expensive lithium batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tallahassee Lassie

customer_reviews.title: Blinded by the Book Light
customer_reviews.text: Dear god this thing is bright! I need a light with a dimmer and a warmer hue. I've been using this as a flashlight when I'm trying to figure out what the heck my cats are doing... I gave this a one star in the "brightness" category, but a three overall because it clips on nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andream

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but eats batteries quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the light. Wish it was a bit brighter. Buy a bunch of replacement batteries, as it seems to eat batteries for breakfast. On top of that, you need a small precision Phillips screwdriver to change out the batteries. In a nutshell, nice light but it's a pain to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright, but difficult to control and angle. I wish it were more concentrated on the page. It works for now, but I will look for another option in the future. I wouldn’t recommend it for an airplane because the light will drive other passengers nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzibella

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It only lights about 1/2 of one page at a time, so you have to keep moving & adjusting it every page. It also falls off very easily. Overall, I found this light completely useless because the required constant adjusting is tedious & obviously dramatically slows down reading.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: I had a book light prior to this one that was very durable. I have no idea how this gets high reviews!! It is a hunk of junk. The opening is not big enough, the cord which corrects the light is flimsy and doesnt hold the place you bend it. Choose w different book light!
customer_reviews.author: amazon4evr2015

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: A great little book light. Very light. It is somewhat bright but not distractingly soul. Works well on both hardback and paperback books. Can’t judge battery life yet. Looks like the battery may require a jewelers type. After I Purchased and used my light, my wife ordered one also. Description of this product was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Light isn't really adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. The neck is not flexible enough to be able to direct the light onto the page. Who wants a bright LED light shining in their eyes while they are trying to read? Not me.
customer_reviews.author: All Around Geek

customer_reviews.title: Started Messing Up After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: when i first got it it worked fine the light was just a little bright for my liking. But after just 2 months the light is already flickering even with the slightest touch. also the switch to turn the light on and off is a little messed up so that you have to push it all the way up to turn it on but you only have to barely touch it to where it's not touching the on side, rather than having to push it past the half way mark to turn it off. between the bright light and flickering with the slightest movement, i would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: DBrewer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a reading light with a battery because I kept losing the charger to the chargeable ones. I like this reading light because I have used it for hours for several days and the battery hasn't died yet. It also easily illuminates the room unlike other dull lights. My only complaint is that the neck is weak. It could bend better and more easily; sometimes I find myself readjusting it so that it stays focused on the page.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great for late night reads.
customer_reviews.text: I turn the night stand light off and the main bedroom light off now and enjoy a good read till I fall asleep. I bought two for me and my honey so she won’t disturb my slumber. It’s good lighting and not extreme, not sure why people say it’s “too bright”.
customer_reviews.author: Bretechtv

customer_reviews.title: Great Book Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this book light!! It gives just enough light for me to read with out disturbing my husband at night. I purchased this light in December 2019 and had to replace the battery in March 2020 after using it to read 2- 400 page books at night. The battery is easy enough to change out!
customer_reviews.author: R&J

product_meta.title: Energizer Clip on Book Light for Reading in Bed, LED Reading Light for Books and Kindles, 25 Hour Run Time, Kindle & Book Reading Lamp
feature_bullets: ✅ COMPACT & PORTABLE: Handy, compact, portable Book Light runs on 2 Energizer CR2032 Batteries (included). You'll have long-lasting reading time, and can take this compact book light anywhere with you. Handy to have in power outages!
✅ ADVANCED LED TECHNOLOGY: Re-creates natural reading conditions with advanced LED technology. This type of light provides plenty of visibility for reading, but is still easy on the eyes.

✅ FLEXIBLE NECK & BUILT-IN CLIP: Compact design with flexible and collapsible neck and built-in clip make a perfect travel or camping companion or copilot. Over-sized spring clip easily attaches to books, Kindles, clipboards, visors, etc
✅ OPTIMAL BEAM SIZE: Delivers a beam broad enough to see, yet narrow enough for privacy. Great for reading your book or kindle on planes, in cars, or in a tent on a camping trip.

✅ LONG-LASTING RUN TIME: Has a run-time of up to 25 hours, perfect for those books you just can’t put down. The long-lasting power makes this light a go-to when you want to dive into a good book, even during a long power outage.
✅ VERSATILE CLIP-ON FUNCTION: Clips onto books, tablets, car visors, or any other surfaces that are 0.5 inches (13 mm) thick. Enough light to read just about anything, anywhere.

✅ THE PERFECT GIFT: A perfect small gift for students, auto mechanics, pilots, teachers, and more. This compact reading light makes the perfect stocking stuffer for those book-worms in your life!; 14 lumens of light
